page.title: 05Trade in the area.
page.content: There is a wide variety of shopping and trading facilities in the area ranging from small corner shops which seem to sell nearly everything to large suburban shopping parades which contain supermarkets, banks, Post Office and chemists. Wrythe Green is a parade of shops which can offer most of the above together with an antique shop, car parts and a variety of eating establishments. RoseHill is the largest of the local shopping centres.It caters for most needs and also has a daily steet market which sells fruit and vegetables. Smaller centres exist on Bishopsford Road,Epsom Road and Green Lane. For a greater choice of goods and shop services many people travel to Sutton, Croydon,Kingston and the West End.
